```{r print recipes}
for(i in 1:length(recs)){
  #Start with page break
  cat("\\break \n  \n")
  
  #Print recipe name
  cat("#", recs[i], " \n  \n \\hrule \n \\vspace{5 mm}  \n  \n")  
  
  #IF there is an image:
  if(length(img[[i]]!=0)){
    #cat("\\hfill \\includegraphics[height=2in]{", img[[i]], "} \n  \n", sep="")
    cat("\\HUGE ", recs[i], "\\normalsize \\hfill \\includegraphics[align=c, height=3in]{", img[[i]], "} \n  \n", sep="")
  } else {
    cat("\\HUGE", recs[i], "\\normalsize")
  }

  #Add a horizontal line
  cat("\\vspace{5 mm}  \\hrule \n \n")
  
  #Print ingredients
  ingred.table <- kable(ingred[[i]], format="latex")
    
  cat("## Ingredients \n  \n", ingred.table, " \n  \n")
  
  #Print Steps
  cat("## Steps \n  \n", step.str[[i]], "\n  \n")
}

```
